Name: multiple personality disorder
Definition: A dissociative disorder that involves the simultaneous display of multiple distinct identities or personalities.

Name: dissociative amnesia
Definition: A dissociative disorder where he continuity of the patient's memory is disrupted. Patients with dissociative amnesia have recurrent episodes in which they forget important personal information or events

Name: depersonalization disorder
Definition: A dissociative disorder in which the sufferer is affected by persistent or recurrent feelings of depersonalization and/or derealization.
